name: WarShip HD
storyline:
The screams of seamen echo in the deep and wild seas.
Now, the seamen will go through an adventure, risking their lives, fighting at sea. Advance to where no human has been before and become a master of Sea.
Only brave and the wise can be a master of sea.
summary:
There are enemies who have powerful warships and weapons in each zone. As you defend an attack by the enemies, you’ll get stronger. As you get stronger, you acquire trophies and in return you get stronger warships, each warship having a special feature. However, there will be pirates that will try to steal your trophies, so keep an eye out and make sure the trophies aren’t stolen.
We hope you win by understanding the features of each warship.
We wish you your victory.
